nodes.text: Corr was a female Human aboard the space station Carrick Station, selling combat gear during the Cold War.

Corr first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a PvP Gear Vendor. Corr's appearance and gear was changed with the release of Game Update 2.0, when the elder game gear system was overhauled.
